text:
@realDonaldTrump You know what Donny? I think I'm going to go out and buy a flag and burn it in your disgrace on the 4th of July. One of yours too.
Thank-you, since I'm still laying low because round two of your Covid-19 handling is well on its way, I wasnt sure how I was going to celebrate.
